title: What is Malala Yousafzai fighting for? - Quora

response.answer_text: Everything.  Literally.  She is fighting for human dignity, freedom of choice in every aspect of life, freedom of thought, freedom of religion.  Freedom.  She is the ultimate freedom fighter and Liberator.  She is a gift to humankind.

Malala Yosufzai is a Pakistani activist fighting for the rights of girls' education. In particular, she is known for advocating the rights of women. At that time when the Taliban had stopped going to the girls in school. Since then, Yusufzai's small advocacy has become an international campaign today.
